concept.title: Personal Information Tile
concept.shortdesc: Within the Personal Information tile in MyPack Portal, you will be able to view all of your personal information.

conbody.p: The following details display in the Personal Information tile:

ul.li: Personal Details (Student ID number, Name and Preferred Name)
Veterans Information (Military Affiliation, Request Benefits Certification, Review Benefits Requests)
OIS Compliance Verification (for International students only)
